vote.title: Authorize (1) a Standard Utility Agreement with the State of Texas, acting through the Texas Department of Transportation, for water and wastewater relocations and appurtenance adjustments in Interstate Highway (IH)-30 (IH-30), from IH-35 to IH-45; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds from the Texas Department of Transportation for reimbursement of inspections, testing and project management costs - Estimated Revenue: $47,676.75; and (3) an Advanced Funding Agreement with the State of Texas, acting through the Texas Department of Transportation, for utility betterment costs to upsize an existing water main - Not to exceed $230,216.22 - Financing: Water Capital Improvement G Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) a Standard Utility Agreement with the State of Texas, acting through the Texas Department of Transportation, for water and wastewater relocations and appurtenance adjustments in Interstate Highway (IH)-30 (IH-30), from IH-35 to IH-45; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds from the Texas Department of Transportation for reimbursement of inspections, testing and project management costs - Estimated Revenue: $47,676.75; and (3) an Advanced Funding Agreement with the State of Texas, acting through the Texas Department of Transportation, for utility betterment costs to upsize an existing water main - Not to exceed $230,216.22 - Financing: Water Capital Improvement G Fund
